venue.address_1: Corner of Main Street and Wheelock Street
venue.name: Collis Center Room 218

item.description:
This month's vegan potluck will be centered around the theme of Thanksgiving. Please bring your favorite vegan Thanksgiving dish to share with others, along with the recipe.

I will scan all of the recipes at the end of the potluck and e-mail them to the NH/VT Vegan Meetup group for inspiration in planning your own cruelty-free Thanksgiving dinner.

I'm also hoping that we can have a lively discussion about how to (politely) deal with the inevitable sticky situations that arise when enjoying a Thanksgiving meal with omnivorous family members.

Lastly, I will be taking donations from anyone who wants to help the NH/VT Vegan Meetup Group adopt a turkey through Farm Sanctuary.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign that says "Vegan Thanksgiving!"
item.name: Vegan Pre-Thanksgiving Feast and Recipe Exchange
